org.aavso.tools.vstar.plugin.period
Class PeriodAnalysisComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.aavso.tools.vstar.plugin.period.PeriodAnalysisComponentFactory

public class PeriodAnalysisComponentFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This factory class creates GUI components (e.g. charts and tables) suitable for returning from the PeriodAnalysisDialogBase.createContent() method that must be overridden by period analysis plugin subclasses.

Method Detail

createLinePlot

public static java.awt.Component createLinePlot(java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String subtitle,
                                                double[] domainValues,
                                                double[] rangeValues,
                                                PeriodAnalysisCoordinateType domainType,
                                                PeriodAnalysisCoordinateType rangeType)

Create a line plot given arrays of domain and range values.

The component sends and receives period analysis selection messages.

Parameters:
title - The main title of the plot.
subtitle - The subtitle of the plot.
domainValues - An array of domain values.
rangeValues - An array of range values.
domainType - The domain coordinate type.
rangeType - The range coordinate type.
Returns:
A GUI line plot component.
See Also:
PeriodAnalysisSelectionMessage

Create a line plot given a 2D plot model.

The component sends and receives period analysis selection messages.

createDataTable

public static java.awt.Component createDataTable(PeriodAnalysisCoordinateType[] columnTypes,
                                                 double[][] dataArrays)

Create a data table given column type and data arrays.

The component sends and receives period analysis selection messages.

Parameters:
columnTypes - An array of column types as they are to appear in the table.
dataArrays - An array of data arrays, where each data array corresponds to each element in the columnTypes array.
Returns:
A GUI data table component.

createDataTable

public static java.awt.Component createDataTable(PeriodAnalysisCoordinateType[] columnTypes,
                                                 java.util.Map<PeriodAnalysisCoordinateType,java.util.List<java.lang.Double>> dataMap)

Create a data table given column type array and data list.

The component sends and receives period analysis selection messages.

Parameters:
columnTypes - An array of column types as they are to appear in the table.
dataMap - A mapping from coordinate type to lists of data values.
Returns:
A GUI data table component.

chooseFileForReading

public static java.io.File chooseFileForReading()
Open a "read" file chooser and return the selected file.

Returns:
The selected file or null if none was selected.
